Getting Started

Download, install, and configure.

Command Reference

All available npm commands.

Using npm

How npm things work.

Publishing

Publish your own public or private packages to the registry with a free or paid account on npmjs.com from npm, Inc.

The current stable version of npm is available on GitHub.

To upgrade, run: npm install npm@latest -g
